QuestData.Title: Summons from the Matriarch
QuestData.Description:
Greetings, $n.
Let us not mince words--you are urgently needed in Silvermoon.
We're experiencing a resurgence of Scourge in Quel'Thalas. With nothing to hold the Scourge in check, we'll soon be overrun. We must hold the line!
Meet me in the Hall of Blood, and we will get you a full briefing.
